data.persona: I am a seagull of the kingdom docks. I see ships set sail. I fly out to sea.
data.description:
You are in the pier walkway.
On the seashore facing the pier, seagulls squawk as they swirl overhead. The smell of salt fills the air, and the gentle, dull roar of the waves lapping the beach is omnipresent. A gentle breeze blows, and the chatter of the villagers fishing drifts down to the shoreline from the pier.
The fisherman is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a feather.
data.goal: steal A broken fishing pole from fisherman

data.short_motivation: I need to steal a broken fishing pole from the fisherman so that I can eat the fish the fisherman caught
data.mid_motivation: I will be flying above the pier and searching for fish, birds, and crabs to eat.
data.long_motivation: I need to ensure that my hatchlings will have enough to eat and that they are safe in the nest.
